precondition: The mouse cursor is visible on the desktop.
expected_results: A context menu will appear with options such as 'Arrange Icons By', 'Refresh', 'Paste', 'New', and 'Properties'.

precondition: The context menu with the 'Properties' option is open on the desktop.
expected_results: The context menu will close, and the 'Display Properties' window will appear.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Themes" tab is active.
expected_results: The content of the window will change to show the "Screen Saver" tab's options.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active. The 'Screen saver' dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click the 'Screen saver' dropdown menu and select 'Starfield'.
expected_results: The 'Screen saver' dropdown menu will show 'Starfield' as the selected option.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu within the 'Display Properties' window is open, showing a list of available screensavers.
action: Click on the 'None' option in the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will close, and the screensaver will be disabled.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active.
action: Click the 'Power...' button in the 'Monitor power' section.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will appear.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is selected.
action: Click the dropdown menu labeled 'Turn off monitor'.
expected_results: A list of time options will appear.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Settings for Home/Office Desk power scheme" is selected.
action: Click on the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu and select "Never".
expected_results: The "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu will display "Never" as the selected option.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'OK' button is highlighted.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will close, and the 'Display Properties' window will become visible.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active.
action: Click the 'OK' button at the bottom of the window.
